languages.text: "Кальян на {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g} и обскуре. Штука забористая, но не слишком — самое то, чтобы расслабиться и отвлечься от... всякого".
"Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."
languages.original_text: "Кальян на {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g} и обскуре. Штука забористая, но не слишком — самое то, чтобы расслабиться и отвлечься от... всякого".

traits.locale_text: "Just a mix of lho and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just right to relax and distract yourself from... stuff."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just a mix of lho and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just right to relax and distract yourself from... stuff."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Juste un mélange de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} et d'obscura. Ça fait son petit effet. Pas au point de mettre KO, mais c'est suffisant pour se détendre et éviter de penser... à ses soucis. »
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: « Juste un mélange de lho et d'obscura. Ça fait son petit effet. Pas au point de mettre KO, mais c'est suffisant pour se détendre et éviter de penser aux... choses qui fâchent. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Es solo una mezcla de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} y obscura. Se sube un poco; no tanto como para dejarme atontada, pero lo suficiente para relajarme y distraerme de... sus preocupaciones».
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: «Es solo una mezcla de lho y obscura. Se sube un poco; no tanto como para dejarme atontada, pero lo suficiente para relajarme y distraerme de... otras cosas».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}麻烟{/g}和迷酊混在一起的东西。这种烟劲儿很大，虽然不至于把你弄晕过去，但可以帮助你放松下来，不去……操那些破心。”
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: “是麻烟和迷酊混在一起的东西。这种烟劲儿很大，虽然不至于把你弄晕过去，但可以帮助你放松下来，不去在意那些……东西。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}アイホ{/g}とオブスキュラの組み合わせです。意識は飛ばせないけど、リラックスするには十分。色々な事から気を紛らわせる」
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: 「アイホとオブスキュラの組み合わせです。意識は飛ばせないけど、リラックスするには十分。色々な事から気を紛らわせる」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nur eine Mischung aus {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} und Obscura. Hat ein bisschen Wumms — nicht genug, um einen umzuhauen, nur gerade genug, dass man ein wenig abschalten und seine ... Sorgen vergessen kann."
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."

traits.locale_text: "Nur eine Mischung aus Lho und Obscura. Hat ein bisschen Wumms — nicht genug, um einen umzuhauen, nur gerade genug, dass man ein wenig abschalten kann, sich von ... Sachen ablenken."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}Liho{/g} ve obsküra karışımı. Biraz sert ama kendinden geçirecek kadar değil de rahatlamana ve... Dertlerinden uzaklaşmana yardım edecek kadar."
languages.original_text: "Just a mix of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} and obscura. Got a kick to it — not enough to knock you out, but just enough to help you relax and distract yourself from... your worries."
